summary: REQ-38 and REQ-39 appear implemented: SplashScreen now uses the new static PSC study PNG and shows the exact tagline "सफलता को साथी"; Dashboard header no longer shows the AppLogo next to the title/avatar. REQ-40 (shorter course card height) is claimed in the summary but cannot be verified from the truncated Dashboard.tsx diff snippet provided.

missing_requirements.requirement: Make the "खरिदार तयारी कोर्स" course card/box on the Dashboard smaller in vertical size by reducing its effective height (primarily by bringing the bottom edge/spacing upward) while keeping the left, right, and top visual edges consistent with the current design.
missing_requirements.reason: The Dashboard.tsx diff is truncated before the Courses section/card styling; the provided snippet does not show any concrete change to the course card height/padding, so implementation cannot be confirmed from available diff evidence.
